price: kecuali orang yang bertobat, beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, maka mereka itu akan masuk surga dan tidak dizalimi (dirugikan) sedikit pun,
arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
